io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.transform.base

Class RegexBasedSampler<S extends Sampler<String>,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.base.CachingBasedSampler<O>
      • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.transform.base.TransformationBasedSampler<S,String,O>
        • io.wcm.qa.glnm.sampling.transform.base.RegexBasedSampler<S,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - type of input sampler
    O - type of transformed output returned by this sampler
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CachingSampler<O>, CanCache, Sampler<O>, TransformingSampler<S,String,O>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RegexGroupBasedSampler, RegexReplaceSampler, RegexSampler, RegexSingleGroupSampler

    public abstract class RegexBasedSampler<S extends Sampler<String>,O>
extends TransformationBasedSampler<S,String,O>
    Abstract base class for implementations that transform string samples based on a regular expression.
    Since:
    1.0.0
